title: Cheesy colcannon
ingredients: ['3 potatoes, peeled and quartered', '1 pinch salt', '6 tablespoons butter, cut into small chunks', '120ml soured cream', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon milk, or as needed', '1 teaspoon butter, or as needed', '200g shredded cabbage', '2 leeks, chopped', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 chicken stock cubes', '60g grated Cheddar cheese']
